#sidebar SyntaxSidebar
= `varPrintAfter` =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [varPrintSyntax varPrint] > [varPrintAfterMethodPHP varPrintAfter]
=== Parameters ===
 * *$varName* _String_
  Variable avaible in scope of type Array or Object.  $varName should NOT start with $.


=== Description ===
Prints variable $varName after matched elements.


== Example ==


=== Markup ===
{{{
 <div>
     <p>FOO</p>
 </div>

}}}
=== Formula ===
{{{
 $template['p']->varPrintAfter('name.key');

}}}
=== Template ===
{{{
 <div>
     <p>FOO</p>
 <?php  if (isset($name['key'])) print $name['key'];
 else if (isset($name->{'key'})) print $name->{'key'};  ?>
 </div>

}}}
=== Template tree ===
{{{
 div
  - p
  -  - Text:FOO
  - PHP

}}}
----


=== Comments allowed ===
